title: Design of an e-Learning System Based on IMS Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of e-learning systems and web-based learning experience
context.additional_context: A course for novice professional learners in managerial/leadership roles to enhance e-learning system design competencies in language education

learning_goals: The method of separating e-learning processes using IMS Learning Design standards can be explained
A plan to apply a 3-tier architecture based on SOA (Service-Oriented Architecture) to e-learning systems can be designed
IMS Learning Designs can be converted and executed at the process level using BPEL (Business Process Execution Language)
Criteria for evaluating scalability, reusability, and integration feasibility of e-learning systems can be applied
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
